npcText: An overweight man in his thirties. There doesn't seem to be anything special about him.
Bill: I have no idea how I ended up here. I had a massive headache and blacked out... and here I am.

playerText: What were you doing when that happened?
How did you get a ticket?
npcText: Bill: I just had it in my pocket when I came around.

playerText: How are you feeling right now?
npcText: Bill: My body feels kind of stiff... I probably hurt myself during the game.
